name: Citrus Studios
description:
Citrus Studios is an award-winning Los Angeles-based interactive design, development, and consulting firm that specializes in providing integrated design & programming.
Citrus' designs are as intelligent and functionally effective as they are visually compelling. The successful union of graphic and information design is one of the firm's strengthsâ€”Citrus' designs support navigability and accessibility within an innovatively designed framework.
